ygData.subject: Re: [cantera] Problem compiling Cantera (CVS) on Linux
ygData.msgSnippet: Rick, This problem has been noted before.  If you change the line to be this then it will compile. //scale(x, damp); scale(x.begin(),x.end(),x.begin(),damp);

Rick,

This problem has been noted before.  If you change the line to be  =

this then it will compile.

         //scale(x, damp);
         scale(x.be=
gin(),x.end(),x.begin(),damp);

Karl

 I'm

matching function for call to
